text: On Thurö Island, a man and a woman lived in absolute austerity. Throughout his life the man only wore hats made of straw. In winter, and without heating the house, the two sat by the open door of the fireplace, and drank in the warmth of the fire. When they died, one after the other, they were buried together, and with the goods they left behind or by a collection, a funeral feast was organized for the whole community, as was the custom. It was the only abundant food the couple offered. FIN
title: La gran comida
author: Bertolt Brecht
